title: Navaratna Kundan Ear Studs - The Auspicious Bloom
features: Circular design featuring the traditional Navaratna arrangement. Each gemstone is carefully set within a Kundan setting, surrounded by dazzling Cubic Zirconia. The gold has a rich Hyderabadi polish, adding a touch of vintage charm and enhancing the gemstone colors. The openwork design at the base provides both elegance and secure mounting.
occasions: Suitable for both traditional occasions like weddings (Vivahaalu)
as well as modern events such as parties
description: Auspicious and stylish, these Navaratna earrings offer the protective and good-luck symbolism of nine gemstones. Crafted with exquisite detail and a classic design, they are a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of antique elegance, making these earrings a unique statement piece. Perfect as a gift or a cherished heirloom.
